name: ciagneis-Final 2D Shooter
description:
Modification added:

2 of the mods include having two complete levels with different gameplay, one being a maze and the other a kind of boss battle.

I also changed most of the assets like the player, enemies, background, and environment for the second level to fit a storyline.

There's also a couple small features like blackholes that make you die and a different way to end the level in the maze (find the planet).
